articles.title: Majority in new poll supports school mask, vaccine mandates | TheHill - The Hill

articles.content:

articles.author: Nick Paton Walsh, Sam Kiley and Sheena McKenzie, CNN
articles.title: Afghan visa applicants told to stay away from Kabul airport as US races to meet exit deadline - CNN
articles.description: Afghans who have applied for special immigrant visas to the US were told to stay away from Kabul's airport on Monday, as American officials ramped up evacuation flights and the Taliban said all US forces needed to leave Afghanistan by August 31.

articles.title: Bali 'suitcase killer' set for early release: lawyer - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: An American woman convicted with her boyfriend of killing her mother and stuffing the body in a suitcase at a luxury Bali hotel is to be freed from prison early, her lawyer said Monday.

articles.title: Sainsbury's shares jump 14% after takeover bid speculation - This is Money
articles.description: Major American buyout group Apollo, which missed out on the takeover of Asda last year, is thought to be among the firms eyeing up Sainsbury's, according to reports.
articles.content:
Shares in Sainsbury's shot up to the top of the FTSE 100 leaderboard today after speculation that Britain's second-biggest supermarket was being circled by private equity predators.

articles.title: Afghanistan: 46 Afghan Hindus, Sikhs and 3 Guru Granth Sahib being brought back to India - Times Now
articles.description: Earlier today, India brought back 146 of its nationals in four different flights from Qatar's capital Doha, days after they were evacuated from Afghanistan by NATO and American aircraft.
